skeptics.name: Adrian Covert
skeptics.title: Journalist
skeptics.excerpt: The lulz were abundant. But frankly, it’s time for you to go. Farewell.

skeptics.name: Michael Calore
skeptics.title: Journalist
skeptics.article: Wired, Tired, Expired for 2012: From Stellar to Suck
skeptics.excerpt: Then came the malware, the black market, the legal ambiguities and The Man. Today, you can't even use it to buy Facebook stock

skeptics.name: Tim Worstall
skeptics.title: Journalist
skeptics.article: So, That's the End of Bitcoin Then
skeptics.excerpt: It’s difficult to see what the currency has going for it.
